summary: I wanted all my objects of certain types grouped together, but didn't want to have the names super long, so i just add a Letter to the Front to keep Ore together, O: Ingot's  - I:
descriptionHtml:
[center][size= +4]Minimalist Renaming[/size][/center]
[center][size= +1]for better sorting[/size][/center]

[heading]Description[/heading]
This was a very quick and simple mod to help organize items together, I didn't want the whole line taken up, so i simplified to one or two letters.

O: Ore
I: Ingots
P: Pelts
G: Gems
SG (E): Empty Soul Gems
SG (F): Full Soul Gems
J: A: Jewelry Amulets
J: R: Jewelry Rings

[heading]Known Errors[/heading]
These changes effect the Base Item, some quests take these and add something to them, like the Stolen <gem> for Thieves Guild fishing quests... there is nothing that can really be done about this.

[heading]Comment[/heading]
Please feel free to comment any errors are requests for additional items.
author: Morgaloth
